definition: Fanshi county in Xinzhou 忻州[Xin1 zhou1], Shanxi
complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters

sentences.english: Fanshi County, Xinzhou City, Shanxi Province in China under the jurisdiction of a county.
sentences.chinese: 繁峙縣是中國山西省忻州市所轄的一個縣。

sentences.english: Yan Shan Temple locates in the Tianyan Village 36 kilometers away from the town Fansi in Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 巖山寺位於繁峙縣城東南36公里處的天巖村。
